---
title: "News"
description: |
  This is where we share the latest news and updates from our lab.<br>
  Stay up to date with our research, publications, and activities.
listing: 
  contents: 
    - "**/index.qmd"
    - "**/index.markdown"
    - "**/index.md"
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  fields: [title, author, categories, date, image]
  image-align: left
  # image-height: 10em
  # page-size: 5
format: 
  html: 
    page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
comments: false

header-includes: >
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/listing-default.css">
  <script src="../assets/custom-category-toggle.js"></script>
  <script>
    // Ensure our custom script runs before Quarto's listing script
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
      console.log('News page DOM loaded, setting up custom handlers');
      if (window.setupCategoryHandlers) {
        window.setupCategoryHandlers();
      }
    });
    
    // Also ensure categories are loaded before our custom script runs
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      console.log('News page loaded, checking for quarto-listing-loaded');
      if (window['quarto-listing-loaded']) {
        console.log('Calling quarto-listing-loaded');
        window['quarto-listing-loaded']();
      } else {
        console.log('quarto-listing-loaded not found, will retry');
        // Retry after a short delay
        setTimeout(function() {
          if (window['quarto-listing-loaded']) {
            console.log('Calling quarto-listing-loaded (delayed)');
            window['quarto-listing-loaded']();
          }
        }, 500);
      }
    });
  </script>
resources:
  - ../assets/listing-default.css
---
